title: Test Pilot Recipe
full_text:
Test Pilot Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1/2
ounce
falernum
1
tablespoon
Cointreau
1 1/2
ounces
dark Jamaican rum
3/4
ounce
light Puerto Rican rum
1
dash
Angostura bitters
6
drops
Pernod
1
cup
crushed
ice
Directions
Put all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed for 5 seconds. Pour unstrained into a double old-fashioned glass, adding more crushed ice to fill. Garnish as desired.
Special equipment
Blender
Rum
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
Frozen Drinks
